text: There is no place for life in Nagash domain, flesh will rot and bones will crumble, even earth itself rises to form great walls to deter living invaders.
The whole world will bow to the True God.
Every defeated skeleton warrior is replaced by ten more as endless sea of undead marches on.
Power of Nagash is immeasurable, as is his hat.
We're in the end game now
This settlement has been blessed with Nagash presence and received his blessing.
Make sure Nagash is in your region you want to bless, this rite will change region ungrowing region into growing one.
